mapper.select: SELECT pt.*, u.user_name, p.name AS project_name, t.tenant_code, t.tenant_name, q.queue, q.queue_name FROM t_ds_process_template pt JOIN t_ds_user u ON pt.user_id = u.id JOIN t_ds_project p ON pt.project_id = p.id JOIN t_ds_tenant t ON t.id = u.tenant_id JOIN t_ds_queue q ON t.queue_id = q.id WHERE p.id = #{projectId} AND pt.name = #{processTemplateName}

SELECT pt.*, u.user_name, p.name AS project_name FROM t_ds_process_template pt LEFT JOIN t_ds_user u ON u.id = pt.user_id LEFT JOIN t_ds_project p ON p.id = pt.project_id WHERE pt.id = #{processTemplateId}
SELECT * FROM t_ds_process_template WHERE project_id = #{projectId} ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT * FROM t_ds_process_template WHERE id IN
#{i}

SELECT pt.user_id AS user_id, u.user_name AS user_name, COUNT(0) AS count FROM t_ds_process_template pt LEFT JOIN t_ds_user u ON u.id = pt.user_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND pt.project_id IN
#{i}
GROUP BY pt.user_id, u.user_name
